--- In gladiator@y..., "Rory Wilde" <laughingmadman@h...> wrote:
> besides, any decent thief could destroy that scenario. all he has to 
do is 
> stay invisible and spawn poison clouds. the A.I. isn't that smart.

Actually I make that scenario fun by killing the slime last.  Any 
decent mage who can freeze time can eventually beat all scenarios, 
given a large enough amount of time.

* * *

I was hoping for some debate about the dual bonded dual class hybrids 
being way too powerfull, but, apparantly, no person seems to think so.
